item.title: GitPitch CI Intro
item.description: Introduction GitPitch CI is delivered as a Docker image. This image can be used as an executor within your CI/CD pipeline to generate PDF, PPTX, and/or JPG screenshots for slide decks found in any Git repository. Like any CI/CD pipeline job, GitPitch CI can be launched in response to typical events such as a commit, tag, or release on target branches and repositories. The steps to activate GitPitch CI within your pipeline are dependent on your CI/CD provider.
